title: Gut Health
cleaned_text: Description A dietary supplement to support immune system health.* Gut Health is aimed at providing the most potent immune supportive nutrients both on a daily basis as well as during acute immune stress.* Because these ingredients support the immune system ability to adapt and not simply upregulate immune function, those with hyperactive immune responses may also incorporate this formula, under a physician's supervision, into their daily regimen For more info: [Sell sheet link](https://magnoliapersonalizedmedicine.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Gut-Health-Sell-Sheet.pdf) SUPPLEMENT FACTS Serving Size 2 Capsules Amout Per Serving Colostrum 500 mg yielding Immunoglobulins (IgG) 200 mg Monolaurin 300 mg Bakers yeast beta glucan 250 mg Other ingredients: hypromellose (capsule), microcrystalline cellulose, vegetarian leucine. Contains: Milk. Warning: If pregnant or nursing, consult your healthcare practitioner before taking this product. Suggested Use: As a dietary supplement, take 2 capsules daily, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner Disclaimer, Policies, Shipping Shipping Policy Most products ship within 2-3 business days of order receipt. Certain items ship within 7-10 business days. We reserve the right to consolidate shipments when the cart contains products from each fulfillment period. Return Policy We strive to provide products that will help you live a healthy life and our intent is to make you happy. Specialty Items are final sale and may not be returned. - 30 day money back on unopened products. Disclaimer The content of this website is based upon the opinion of Dr. Ellie Wright. The information on this website is not intended as medical advise nor to replace a one-on-one relationship with a qualified health care professional. Dr. Wright encourages you to make your own health care decisions based upon our research and to seek a qualified health care professional to help you. If you have a medical condition, if you are taking medications or if you are pregnant or nursing consult your health care professional before using products from this website. This website is intended to share information and knowledge obtained by Dr. Ellie Wright. FDA COMPLIANCE The information on this website has not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration or any other medical body. We do not aim to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness or disease. Information is shared for educational purposes only. You must consult your doctor before acting on any content on this website, especially if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication or have a medical condition.
